ViewObject.Name: OtpTimerView
ViewObject.SQLQuery: select sl_no, passed_time, current_time, time_left, mins, secs from ( select rownum sl_no, to_timestamp(:pOtpEndTime, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') passed_time, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') current_time, to_number(extract(minute from (to_timestamp(:pOtpEndTime, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')-sysdate))) mins, trunc(extract(second from (to_timestamp(:pOtpEndTime, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')-sysdate))) secs, ((case when (extract(minute from (to_timestamp(:pOtpEndTime, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')-sysdate)) < 0) then '00' else (case when (extract(minute from (to_timestamp(:pOtpEndTime, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')-sysdate)) < 10) then to_char('0'||extract(minute from (to_timestamp(:pOtpEndTime, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')-sysdate))) else to_char(extract(minute from (to_timestamp(:pOtpEndTime, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')-sysdate))) end) end) ||':'|| (case when (extract(second from (to_timestamp(:pOtpEndTime, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')-sysdate)) < 0) then '00' else (case when (trunc(extract(second from (to_timestamp(:pOtpEndTime, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')-sysdate))) < 10) then to_char('0'||trunc(extract(second from (to_timestamp(:pOtpEndTime, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')-sysdate)))) else to_char(trunc(extract(second from (to_timestamp(:pOtpEndTime, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')-sysdate)))) end) end) ) time_left from dual )
